alert.note: Alert for Saginaw; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 2:27PM EDT until July 20 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN SAGINAW AND NORTHERN SHIAWASSEE COUNTIES... At 227 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Montrose to near Lennon to Perry, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... New Lothrop and Lennon around 230 PM EDT. Birch Run around 235 PM EDT. Frankenmuth around 240 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Swan Creek, Juddville, Shiawassee National Wildlife Refuge, Garfield, Fosters, Burt, Gera, Layton Corners, Carland and Buena Vista Township. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
